item.title: grep, awk, sed 简介
item.description: grep, awk and sed are three of the most useful command-line tools1 in *nix world. And this article will give you a brief introduction and basic usages of these three different commands. grep grep (Global Regular Expression Print) is used to search for specific terms in a file. Different from awk and sed, grep can’t add/modify/remove the text in a specific file. But it’
